name: Dominator_Control.Fire_Control
display_help: You can control the essence of fire to entrap, scorch, and manipulate your foes with smoke and flame.

powers.name: Dominator_Control.Fire_Control.Ring_of_Fire
powers.display_help: Immobilizes your target in a Ring of Fire, dealing Fire damage over time. More resilient foes may require multiple Fire Rings to Immobilize. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Fast

display_info: 5 ticks of 11.62 fire damage over 9.2s on target
5 ticks of 20.40 fire damage over 9.2s on target
10000.00% resistance to knockup, knock for 15s on target

powers.name: Dominator_Control.Fire_Control.Char
powers.display_help: Incapacitates a distant foe by Charring him with smoldering soot and cinders. The target is left helpless, choking on the soot. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Moderate

display_info: 5 ticks of 11.62 fire damage over 4.2s on target
5 ticks of 21.73 fire damage over 4.2s on target

powers.name: Dominator_Control.Fire_Control.Fire_Cages
powers.display_help: Immobilizes a group of foes in Fire Cages, dealing Fire damage over time. More resilient foes may require multiple Fire Cages to Immobilize. Fire Cages is slower and less damaging than Ring of Fire, but can capture multiple targets. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Moderate
powers.display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Minor DoT(Fire), Foe Immobilize

display_info: 3 ticks of 5.81 fire damage over 5.2s on target
3 ticks of 6.40 fire damage over 5.2s on target
10000.00% resistance to knockup, knock for 12s on target

powers.name: Dominator_Control.Fire_Control.Smoke
powers.display_help: Covers all foes near your target in clouds of Smoke. Your enemies are so blinded that they can hardly see a thing. Most foes will not be able to see past normal melee range, although some may have better perception. If the affected targets are attacked, they will be alerted to your presence, but will suffer a penalty to their chance to hit. Recharge: Slow

display_info.Aggro Type: Enemies will not notice this attack

powers.name: Dominator_Control.Fire_Control.Hot_Feet
powers.display_help: While active, you heat the earth in a large area around yourself. Enemy movement is Slowed as they attempt to flee the immediate area. All foes in the affected area may suffer some damage over time. You cannot fly and must be near the ground to use this power. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Slow

display_info: -70.00% strength to jump height for 2.25s on target

powers.name: Dominator_Control.Fire_Control.Flashfire
powers.display_help: You can bring forth a Flashfire to Disorient a group of foes and deal some damage over time. Target must be on the ground to activate Flashfire. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Long
powers.display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Minor DoT(Fire), Foe Disorient

display_info: 5 ticks of 3.17 fire damage over 4s on target

powers.name: Dominator_Control.Fire_Control.Cinders
powers.display_help: Incapacitates foes around the caster by whirling Cinders around them. The targets are left helpless, choking on the soot. Recharge: Long

powers.name: Dominator_Control.Fire_Control.Bonfire
powers.display_help: You can create a Bonfire that knocks back and burns any foes who try to pass through it. Recharge: Slow
powers.display_short_help: Ranged (Location AoE), Minor DMG(Fire), Foe Knockback

powers.name: Dominator_Control.Fire_Control.Fire_Imps
powers.display_help: You can craft 3 small Fire Imps out of pure flame in a targeted location. Fire Imps will viciously attack any nearby foes, but they only possess the most basic instincts. Fire Imps can be healed and buffed like any teammate. Recharge: Long
